channel.title: Simple Fix
channel.description:
Hey guys, I haven't coded in about 2 years I know this a simple fix. But, how do I change the IP of a source and Client so that way I can connect to the source on my own, and be able to play by my self. To code the server. Please be descriptive.
EDIT- It is a PI source base.

item.title: Simple Fix
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

Server Sided - Open your source folder/src/server/server.java Scroll down until you see an ip address and change it to yours.
Client Sides - Open client file search for client.java open clien.java search for server = and change that ip to yours aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Fix
item.dc:creator: @Blu-Ray Blu-Ray
item.description:
@Blu-Ray wrote:

ok look for the GUI.java the do CTRL-F and search for 127.0.0.1 or what the uploader had the no-ip set to

Read full topic
